SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Interface LobbyControllerInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
ControllerDispatcher, LobbyController
public interface LobbyControllerInterface

This interface defines the basic actions that a client can perform when tries to connect in a match game or create a new game.

Since:
23/04/2023
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emanuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi
See Also:
  • LobbyController

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    createGame(ClientInterface view, String nickname, int numberOfPlayer)
    This method handles a user's request to create a game.
    void
    joinGame(ClientInterface view, String nickname)
    This method handles a user's request to join a match.
    void
    nop()
    This method is used only to test if a client is still connected.

  • Method Details

    • joinGame

      void joinGame(ClientInterface view, String nickname) throws Exception

      This method handles a user's request to join a match.

      Parameters:
      view - instance of a client that wants to join a game
      nickname - the nickname of the client that is trying to connect at a match
      Throws:
      Exception - if a specific problem of implementing class occurs
      See Also:
      • ClientInterface
      • Player
      • AlreadyTakenNicknameException
      • AlreadyInGameException

    • createGame

      void createGame(ClientInterface view, String nickname, int numberOfPlayer) throws Exception

      This method handles a user's request to create a game.

      Parameters:
      view - instance of a client that wants to create a game
      nickname - the nickname of the client that is trying to create a game
      numberOfPlayer - the max number of player that can join the game
      Throws:
      Exception - if a specific problem of implementing class occurs
      See Also:
      • ClientInterface
      • Player
      • State
      • AlreadyTakenNicknameException
      • AlreadyInGameException
      • FileNotFoundException

    • nop

      void nop()

      This method is used only to test if a client is still connected.
